Title: Staff/Admins of 1337Clan: Ban A_Biohazard29/dirtbikes95
Overview:
Dirtbikes has broken too many rules and should be banned. It is unfair that he gets immunity to many things he does wrong and has more ban appeals than anyone else on the server.

He was finally banned on February 26th of 2014 for bypassing a mute.

His alt account A_Biohazard29 has now recently become very active and is already causing problems.

 

I think that his alt and all of his other accounts (if he has any) should be perma banned.
